name: Mazoid
description:
In Mazoid, plan your way through psychedelic, colorful mazes and race to the end! Complete the daily maze, shared by all players, and share your best time. Or, try your hand at a multitude of randomly generated mazes. No matter what, it's a rad time!

Controlled with the arrow or WASD keys, and shift or ctrl to move faster. Use the arrows and space in menus.

Thanks for playing! Contact me at @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
